Analisis Kompetitor.Strength: Harga termurah (8K), 1500+ gerobak nasional, brand awareness tinggi
Analisis Kompetitor.Weakness: Kualitas kopi standar, tidak ada varian premium, limited menu
Analisis Kompetitor.Menu_Utama: Kopi Susu Jago (8K), Americano (8K), Salted Caramel Latte (10K), Matcha Latte (12K)
Analisis Kompetitor.Keunggulan: Harga paling murah, akses mudah, jaringan luas

Analisis Kompetitor.Strength: Varian menu sangat banyak (60+), brand awareness kuat, harga terjangkau
Analisis Kompetitor.Weakness: Fokus bukan kopi specialist, lebih ke minuman manis, kualitas kopi biasa
Analisis Kompetitor.Menu_Utama: Es Kopasus (9-11K), Kopi Susu Gula Aren (14K), Thai Tea (6-9K), Choco Series (12-15K)
Analisis Kompetitor.Keunggulan: Varian menu terbanyak, harga fleksibel, outlet nyaman

Analisis Kompetitor.Strength: Backing dari Janji Jiwa Group, harga kompetitif, brand trust
Analisis Kompetitor.Weakness: Menu terbatas, kualitas di bawah Janji Jiwa proper, masih baru
Analisis Kompetitor.Menu_Utama: Kopi Susu Sejuta Jiwa (8K), Americano (8K), Butterscotch (10K), Chocolate (10K)
Analisis Kompetitor.Keunggulan: Brand Janji Jiwa, harga murah, distribusi luas

Analisis Kompetitor.Strength: Harga murah, rasa enak, varian menarik (Coconut Latte)
Analisis Kompetitor.Weakness: Brand awareness masih rendah, jaringan terbatas, marketing minim
Analisis Kompetitor.Menu_Utama: Brown Sugar Latte (8K), Coconut Latte (10K), Chocolate (8K), Earl Grey Milk Tea (10K)
Analisis Kompetitor.Keunggulan: Rasa kompetitif, harga murah, varian unik

Analisis Kompetitor.Strength: Kualitas kopi terbaik, brand premium, varian menu kreatif, outlet nyaman
Analisis Kompetitor.Weakness: Harga mahal (18K+), tidak mobile, target market terbatas
Analisis Kompetitor.Menu_Utama: Kopi Kenangan Mantan (18K), Avocado Coffee (22K), Cookie Cream Latte (22K)
Analisis Kompetitor.Keunggulan: Kualitas premium, experience terbaik, brand value tinggi

Customer Detailed Real.Spending_Habit: High - willing to pay Rp15-25K for premium coffee

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Musim hujan Nov-April (puncak Jan-Feb: 22.6 hari hujan/bulan, curah hujan 290mm/bulan) mengurangi mobilitas driver
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Sediakan ponco/jas hujan driver; Partner dengan indoor locations (mall, lobby kantor); Menu hot coffee promotion saat hujan
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Shift ke mode pick-up point di 3 mall; Delay delivery 30-60 menit; Order via WhatsApp manual
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: BMKG forecast hujan >70% probability; Cuaca mendung gelap; Angin kencang

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Banjir di Kembangan saat hujan deras (tercatat 22 Jan 2026: genangan 5-15cm di Jl Raya Kembangan)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Monitoring BMKG daily; Rute alternatif menghindari Jl Raya Kembangan saat hujan; Koordinasi dengan PPSU untuk drainase
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Operasional dari lokasi aman (higher ground); Pompa portable untuk banjir ringan; Tutup operasional jika banjir >30cm
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: BMKG warning hujan ekstrem; Tali air tersumbat; Genangan level 1 (5cm)

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Suhu ekstrem 23-35C dengan kelembaban 77.2% mempengaruhi storage bahan baku
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Storage dengan suhu terkontrol; Packaging insulated; Monitoring expiry date ketat; Stok rotation FIFO
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Emergency purchase dari supermarket; Menu limitation (hanya espresso based); Price adjustment sementara
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Suhu storage >8C; Kelembaban >80%; Bahan baku mendekati expiry

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Kemacetan parah di Jl Raya Kembangan & Outer Ring Road saat rush hour (06:00-09:00, 17:00-20:00)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Dynamic routing algorithm menghindari jam sibuk; Shift operations dimulai 07:00 (sebelum rush hour); Motor listrik untuk manuver lincah
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Mode "parkir tetap" di dekat target area; Driver jalan kaki untuk delivery terakhir 100 meter; Re-schedule delivery
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Google Maps traffic red/black; Waze reports heavy traffic; Social media traffic complaints

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Proyek MRT Kembangan-Balaraja dalam tahap studi (MoU signed Feb 2026) - potensi gangguan konstruksi 2027-2030
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Monitoring proyek MRT; Flexibility positioning; Early warning system; Alternative route planning
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Relokasi sementara ke zona lain; Koordinasi dengan contractor untuk akses; Night operation jika diperlukan
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Berita proyek MRT; Pembersihan lahan; Pemasangan barrier construction

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Akses terbatas ke area tertentu saat jam sekolah (06:30-07:30, 11:30-13:00)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Avoid school zones during peak times (06:30-07:30); Focus on office areas during school rush
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Focus on office areas saat school rush; School break time operations (10:00-11:00, 13:00-14:00)
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Jam sekolah dimulai; Aktivitas anak-anak meningkat; Traffic di depan sekolah merah

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Perizinan motor listrik komersial memerlukan NIB & Sertifikat Standar melalui OSS (KBLI 27111)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Lengkapi NIB & Sertifikat Standar sebelum operasional; Koordinasi dengan Dinas Perdagangan Jakbar; Legal compliance 100%
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Relokasi ke area yang lebih permissible; Pivot ke model delivery-only (tanpa gerobak tetap); Kerjasama dengan tenant exist
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Perubahan Perda; Razia Satpol PP; Surat peringatan dari Dinas

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Regulasi PKL (Pedagang Kaki Lima) berbasis mobile - perlu koordinasi dengan Satpol PP Jakbar
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Lobi Satpol PP Jakbar; Ikut program PKL tertata; Compliance dengan Perda Kota Bersih; Izin lokasi tetap/mobile
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Denda & pelanggaran: Siapkan dana cadangan Rp 50jt; Rapid response team; Public relations management
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Penegakan aturan PKL; Operasi penertiban; Perubahan kebijakan Gubernur

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Perubahan kebijakan motor listrik (Peraturan Gubernur DKI terkait kendaraan listrik 2024)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Monitoring Perda DKI; Diversifikasi kendaraan (siapkan backup motor konvensional); Join association untuk advokasi
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Adaptasi cepat ke regulasi baru; Upgrade kendaraan sesuai standar; Join industry association untuk kolaborasi
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Rapat dewan kota; Draft perda baru; Statement pejabat terkait

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Kopi Jago atau kompetitor mobile coffee masuk Kembangan
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Differentiasi kuat (harga Rp 8K vs kompetitor Rp 15K+); Loyalty program; Exclusive partnership dengan kantor/kampus
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Price war strategy temporary; Market expansion ke area adjacent; Product differentiation intensif; Customer retention program
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Kompetitor buka outlet baru; Price drop kompetitor; Lost customers >10%

Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Kontrak jangka panjang dengan supplier; Hedging harga kopi; Diversifikasi menu (non-coffee 30%); Efficiency improvement
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Menu engineering (kurangi porsi kopi naikkan milk); Substitute beans (Robusta vs Arabica); Price increase 10-15% gradual
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: News harga kopi internasional; Supplier notification price increase; COGS naik >5%

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Perubahan preferensi konsumen ke minuman non-kopi (bubble tea, jus, dll)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Continuous product innovation; Market research berkala; Trend monitoring; Agile menu development
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Quick pivot ke trending products; Marketing repositioning; Partnership dengan influencer; Limited time offers
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Social media trending minuman lain; Survey preferensi berubah; Sales non-coffee turun

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Turnover driver tinggi (industri F&B rata-rata 30-40% per tahun)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Competitive salary (Rp 3.5jt + komisi); Career path clear (Driver  Supervisor  Manager); Training program; Culture building
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Pool driver cadangan (10% dari total); Hiring cepat 3-5 hari; Simplified training module; Outsourcing sementara
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Absenteeism meningkat; Complaint driver naik; Productivity turun >15%

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Keterlambatan supply chain bahan baku (susu, kopi, gula aren)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Multi-sourcing supplier (min 3 vendor); Safety stock 7 hari; Supplier lokal (Kembangan, Jakarta); Contract penalties
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Sourcing darurat dari retail; Bahan substitusi (milk powder vs fresh milk); Operational hour reduction; Premium pricing
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Supplier delay >2 hari; Stock level <3 hari; Quality issue report

Risk Register Detailed.Risk_Description: Motor listrik breakdown (maintenance, baterai, charging issues)
Risk Register Detailed.Mitigation_Strategy: Preventive maintenance schedule; Spare motor standby (10% dari fleet); Fast charging station; Emergency roadside assistance
Risk Register Detailed.Contingency_Plan: Towing service 24 jam; Backup motor ready; Rental motor sementara; Ojek online integration untuk delivery
Risk Register Detailed.Early_Warning_Indicators: Breakdown frequency >2x/minggu; Battery performance drop; Charging time increase

Climate Data BMKG.Impact_to_Operations: Severe - High rain days, potential flooding
Severe - High rain days, potential flooding
Moderate - Less rain, occasional afternoon showers
Low - Rare rain, good for operations
Low - Rare rain, good for operations
